profile.name: Abhijit Rayarao
profile.intro: Building production-grade applications with NestJS, Next.js, and cloud technologies. Currently pursuing M.Sc in Data Science at IIIT Hyderabad.

education.institution: International Institute of Information Technology Hyderabad

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Business Systems

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
highlights: Developed and maintained production-grade applications using NestJS and Next.js in a shared monorepo architecture.
Built 20+ scalable REST APIs and server-side rendered frontend features, improving page load performance by 30–40% and SEO metrics by 2x.
Containerized services using Docker and published images to Docker Hub for consistent deployments.

projects.name: QueryMaster
projects.description: Full-stack SQL learning platform with interactive, LeetCode-style challenges
highlights: Adopted a monorepo architecture with shared types, schemas, and utilities.
Used Prisma ORM for type-safe schema modeling, queries, and migrations.
Integrated Monaco Editor for interactive SQL challenges from schema design to query optimization.
Containerized and deployed using Docker, Docker Hub, and Google Cloud Run.

projects.name: FeatureLab
projects.description: End-to-end ML platform for feature engineering experimentation
highlights: Designed a platform where users select curated datasets and establish baseline model performance.
Built a sandboxed, notebook-style feature engineering playground for custom transformation logic.
Executed user-defined feature pipelines in isolated containerized training jobs.
Provided objective feedback via metric deltas against baseline performance.
